name: The Golden Age of Arcade
description: The birth of video gaming as a cultural phenomenon, driven by arcade cabinets and the rise of iconic franchises.

name: The Crash and Recovery
description: The North American video game crash of 1983 nearly destroyed the industry, until Nintendo's NES revitalized gaming.
keyEvents: Super Mario Bros. saves the industry

name: The Console Wars
description: The fierce competition between Sega and Nintendo defined a generation and pushed gaming innovation forward.

name: The 3D Revolution
description: Gaming enters the third dimension with PlayStation, Nintendo 64, and groundbreaking 3D titles.
keyEvents: The rise of 3D graphics and CD-ROMs

name: Online Gaming Era
description: Broadband internet transforms gaming with Xbox Live, MMORPGs, and the birth of online multiplayer.

name: The Modern Era
description: HD gaming, motion controls, mobile gaming, and the rise of indie developers reshape the industry.
